statements: SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, waste_reduction_target FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE waste_reduction_target > 500;
SELECT initiative_name, responsible_person FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE initiative_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT responsible_person, waste_reduction_target FROM waste_reduction_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name DESC;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE responsible_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE waste_reduction_target > 500.00 ORDER BY initiative_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'Recycling Program';
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE waste_reduction_percent > 20.00;
SELECT * FROM packaging_operations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT operation_name, implemented_by FROM packaging_operations WHERE end_date <= NOW();
SELECT AVG(waste_reduction_percent) AS avg_reduction_percent FROM waste_reduction_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE waste_reduction_percent > 20 ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE waste_reduction_percent BETWEEN 10 AND 30;
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE waste_reduction_percent < 5 OR waste_reduction_percent > 50 ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_operations WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT operation_name, implemented_by FROM packaging_operations WHERE implemented_by LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_operations
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM packaging_operations
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM packaging_operations WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_metrics
SELECT initiative_id, metric_name, metric_value, measurement_date FROM waste_reduction_metrics ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT * FROM packaging_operations WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM packaging_operations WHERE id = 5
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_operations FROM packaging_operations
SELECT material_name, material_type, usage_quantity FROM packaging_materials WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT pr.metric_name, pr.metric_value, pr.measurement_date, po.initiative_name FROM waste_reduction_metrics pr JOIN packaging_operations po ON pr.initiative_id = po.id
SELECT * FROM packaging_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM packaging_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, manager_name FROM packaging_sites WHERE location='New York';
SELECT material_name, recycle_code FROM packaging_materials WHERE recycle_code > 2 ORDER BY recycle_code DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM packaging_sites WHERE site_name = 'Site A';
SELECT site_name, location FROM packaging_sites WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE recycle_code > 2;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT initiative_name, progress_status, progress_description FROM waste_reduction_initiatives INNER JOIN initiative_progress ON waste_reduction_initiatives.initiative_id = initiative_progress.initiative_id WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionInitiatives;
SELECT id, initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM WasteReductionInitiatives WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PackagingOperations WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT operation_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM PackagingOperations WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionInitiatives WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM WasteReductionInitiatives WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT operation_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM PackagingOperations WHERE employee_id = 12345 AND location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY department, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
